label: Jotno Admin Panel(Org)
description: Jotno Admin Panel is a centralized organizational dashboard designed for managing multiple operational aspects of the Jotno ecosystem. It includes features like user management, prescriber onboarding, role-based access control, bulk uploads, and invoice generation. The interface adheres to strict UI/UX fidelity and ensures seamless navigation for administrative workflows.

label: Jotno Doctor Web
description: The Doctor Web app facilitates appointment scheduling, prescription issuance, and profile management for healthcare professionals. It integrates live geolocation tracking and telemedicine capabilities while ensuring responsive UI across devices. The application supports secure login, streamlined session handling, and advanced patient-doctor interaction features.

label: Agrovet
description: Agrovet is a veterinary pharmaceutical management platform that handles distributor-level inventory, sales tracking, and KPI-based reporting. It supports dynamic SKU allocation, APR actualization, and backchannel data access for business users. The solution is scalable and built with robust component design in Angular, tightly coupled with PrimeNG UI components.

label: EDCR(Electronic Daily Call Report)
description: EDCR is a digital platform for field force to log daily calls, customer visits, and product detailing activities. Built as a progressive web app (PWA), it ensures offline data capture and syncing with Firebase. The app simplifies territory management, compliance tracking, and performance logging.

label: MRS
description: MRS is a medical representative scheduling and reporting tool that helps align field visits with sales targets. It includes automated scheduling, visit logging, and summary dashboards. The project simplifies field operations and ensures accountability through structured activity tracking.

label: Central Admin Panel
description: The Central Admin Panel unifies multiple internal tools under a single administrative dashboard for Square Health. It features role-based management, user impersonation, audit logs, and modular integration with different service platforms. The panel was designed to reduce administrative overhead and improve platform governance.

label: Mullar Tex Ltd.
description: This freelance project involved developing a responsive company website for a Bangladeshi textile manufacturer. The site includes a catalog, inquiry form, and content management interface for easy product updates. Focus was given to clean UI and mobile-first design principles.

label: Product Logos(The Hair Gel)
description: A creative freelance project to design logos and product branding for a personal care product line. Deliverables included multiple logo variants, label layouts, and packaging mockups. Tools like Illustrator and Photoshop were used to maintain professional visual identity.

label: CareInvoice
description: CareInvoice is a self-initiated SaaS project that automates invoice generation for small clinics and healthcare startups. It supports Stripe-based payments, client management, and email-based invoice dispatch. The UI was designed with simplicity in mind, using Tailwind and Firebase for backend support.

label: Clique
description: Clique is a prototype of a niche social platform for building closed interest-based communities. Users can join groups, post updates, and collaborate on private threads. The project explored identity handling and access control mechanisms.
tagline: A niche social platform for closed interest-based communities
highlights: Real-time group collaboration and private threads
Identity handling and access control mechanisms

label: Cassette
description: Cassette is a frontend clone of a modern music streaming interface, styled to mimic apps like Spotify. It showcases responsive layouting, search/filtering, and dynamic theming. The app consumes Spotify APIs to simulate a real music browsing experience.

label: Chalkboard
description: Chalkboard is an experimental web app for collaborative whiteboarding and virtual classroom sessions. It features real-time canvas drawing using WebSockets and interactive annotation tools. Built with Next.js and Canvas API, it served as a testbed for synchronous visual collaboration.

label: UI Prompt Tool
description: UI Prompt Tool is a React-based application that transforms natural language prompts into live-renderable HTML and CSS components. Built with Vite and Tailwind CSS v4, the tool integrates the OpenAI Chat API to convert user intents into frontend code. It features a minimalistic design, real-time preview, and deployability on Netlify, aiming to simplify UI prototyping and developer workflows.
tagline: Transform natural language into live-renderable UI components
highlights: OpenAI Chat API integration for code generation
Minimalistic design optimized for developer workflows

label: Prompt-to-Figma Tool
description: Prompt-to-Figma Tool enables real-time conversion of UI descriptions into Figma-compatible JSON or frontend components. Developed using React and Tailwind CSS v4, it leverages OpenAI Chat API to interpret natural language prompts and generate design-ready code. The tool is ideal for bridging design-development workflows and streamlining rapid prototyping.
tagline: Bridge design and development with AI-powered UI generation

label: FryVerse
description: FRYVERSE is a playful, single-page React experience that lets users explore different fry "personalities" and build a custom fry box by choosing a cut, seasoning, and sauce. It blends a premium dark UI with smooth GSAP-driven interactions, Lottie hero animation, and micro-UX details like badges, pairing guidance, and a "Play & Save" mini-game (Catch the Fries) that unlocks discounts. The result feels like a modern interactive product siteâ€”part menu, part customization flow, part arcade.
tagline: A playful, interactive experience that transforms fries into a customizable adventure
highlights: GSAP-driven animations for smooth, premium interactions
Interactive mini-game (Catch the Fries) with discount rewards
Dark UI with Lottie hero animations and micro-UX details
challenges: Balancing performance with complex GSAP animations
Creating an engaging mini-game that feels integrated, not gimmicky
Designing a dark UI that remains accessible and readable

label: Investigator Terminal
description: A premium, portfolio-worthy single-page case dossier interface built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features a modern, minimal monochrome design with scroll-driven animations and a professional investigator terminal aesthetic.
tagline: A premium case dossier interface with terminal aesthetic
highlights: Minimal monochrome design with professional aesthetic
Next.js and TypeScript for type-safe development

label: FMCG Inventory System
description: A production-grade, inventory-based ecommerce platform for FMCG (Fast-Moving Consumer Goods) categories, featuring demand tracking, ABC classification, and inventory management.
tagline: Production-grade inventory management for FMCG categories
highlights: Full-stack TypeScript with NestJS and Prisma
challenges: Ensuring real-time updates across multiple users
